long_description: An urban commuter and daily cruiser, the 27-speed GT Traffic 2.0 Bike boasts city-savvy features, including integrated reflectivity, a protective top tube bumper and powerful disc brakes. Frame features reflective paint hits for enhanced visibility, internal cable routing and rubber bumpers to help protect the frame if you lean it against a rack or wall. 7000-series aluminum frame features a hydroformed top tube for increased performance and a nimble geometry that deftly navigates city streets and clogged traffic. Protection is built right in-locking security bolts secure your wheels, seatpost and fork when locking up the bike (includes key). Flat handlebar keeps you in an upright riding position, improving visibility and taking pressure off hands for enhanced comfort. Hydraulic disc brakes offer powerful stopping. Schwalbe Roadcruiser tires boast puncture protection and reflective sidewalls. Frame includes eyelets for fenders and a rear rack (not included). Specs on the GT Traffic 2.0 Bike are subject to change.
